00024 #include <sys/types.h>
00025 #include <sys/stat.h>
00026 #include <errno.h>
00027 //******************************************************************************
00028 // Checks to see if a directory exists. Note: This method only checks the
00029 // existence of the full path AND if path leaf is a dir.
00030 // 
00031 // @return  >0 if dir exists AND is a dir,
00032 //           0 if dir does not exist OR exists but not a dir,
00033 //          <0 if an error occurred (errno is also set)
00034 static int isDir(const char* path)
00035 {
00036   struct stat info;
00037   int statRC = stat( path, &info );
00038   if(statRC != 0 ){
00039     if(errno == ENOENT)  { return 0; } // something along the path does not exist
00040     if(errno == ENOTDIR) { return 0; } // something in path prefix is not a dir
00041     return -1;
00042   }
00043   int k = (info.st_mode&S_IFDIR)?1:0;
00044   return k;
00045 }
00046 
00047 //******************************************************************************
00048 // Create temp folder for files
00049 // @return path to the temp dir with a trailing slash
00050 static std::string getTempDir()
00051 {
00052 #ifdef WIN32
00053   char *key[] = {"TMP", "TEMP", "USERPROFILE", NULL};
00054 #else
00055   char *key[] = {"TMPDIR", "TMP", "TEMP", "TEMPDIR","USERPROFILE", NULL};
00056 #endif
00057   char *val;
00058   for(int i=0; key[i]!=NULL; i++) {
00059     val = getenv(key[i]);
00060     if(val) break;
00061   }
00062 #ifdef WIN32
00063   std::string path = (val==NULL)?std::string(""):std::string(val);
00064   path += "\\MConf";
00065   std::string mkdir("mkdir "); 
00066   mkdir += path;
00067   int k = isDir(path.c_str());
00068   path += "\\";
00069 #else
00070   std::string path = (val==NULL)?std::string("/tmp"):std::string(val);
00071   path += "/MConf";
00072   std::string mkdir("mkdir -p "); 
00073   mkdir += path;
00074   int k = isDir(path.c_str());
00075   path += "/";
00076 #endif
00077   if(k==0) system(mkdir.c_str());
00078   return path;
00079 }
00080 
00081 // create unique name for temp file
00082 static std::string createFileName(const std::string &name)
00083 {
00084   std::string tmpname = name;
00085   for(int n=1;;++n) {
00086     FILE* fp = ::fopen(tmpname.c_str(),"r");   // try to open
00087     if(fp==0) break; // break if not found
00088     ::fclose(fp);
00089     std::ostringstream os;
00090     os<<name<<"_"<<n;
00091     tmpname=os.str();
00092   }
00093   return tmpname;
00094 }

00102 //*********************************************************************
00103 // constructor
00104 static MC_HANDLE mc_load(const char * fname, CStconfig::fileFormat fmt)
00105 {
00106   C3dMesh * mc = new C3dMesh;  
00107   MC_HANDLE mConf = (MC_HANDLE)mc;
00108   bool ok = mc->load (fname,fmt);
00109   if(!ok) {
00110     std::cout << "MCLOAD: Loading error, file:'"<<fname<<"'\n";
00111     delete (mc);
00112     mConf = 0;    
00113   }
00114   return mConf;
00115 }

00211 WINDLLEXPORT int MCgetRayIntersectionPoints(MC_HANDLE mConf,const double *r0,const double *rd,double *entryPoint,double *exitPoint)
00212 {
00213   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00214   Vector3d R0(r0),Rd(rd);
00215   Vector3d entry;
00216   Vector3d exit;
00217   bool b = mc.getRayIntersectionPoints(R0,Rd,entry,exit);
00218   entry.copyTo(entryPoint);
00219   exit.copyTo(exitPoint);
00220   return b?True:False;
00221 }

00368 WINDLLEXPORT double MCgradRhoAvrg(MC_HANDLE mConf,double s)
00369 {
00370   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00371   double r   = mc.r(s);
00372   double a   = mc.r(1);
00373   double dr_ds  = r/(2*s); // dr_vmec / ds 
00374   return mc.GradsAvrg(s)*dr_ds/a;
00375 }
00376 
00377 
00378 WINDLLEXPORT double MCgradRho2Avrg(MC_HANDLE mConf,double s)
00379 {
00380   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00381   double r   = mc.r(s);
00382   double a   = mc.r(1);
00383   double dr_ds  = r/(2*s); // dr_vmec / ds 
00384   return mc.Grads2Avrg(s)*(dr_ds*dr_ds)/(a*a);
00385 }

00597 WINDLLEXPORT double M3DgetdGradsxyz(MC_HANDLE mConf,const double *xyz,double *gradS,double *dGdx,double *dGdy,double *dGdz)
00598 {
00599   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00600   Vector3d R(xyz);
00601   Vector3d dgdx,dgdy,dgdz;
00602 
00603   Vector3d gs =  mc.M3Dgetdgradsxyz(R,dgdx,dgdy,dgdz);
00604   dgdx.copyTo(dGdx);
00605   dgdy.copyTo(dGdy);
00606   dgdz.copyTo(dGdz);
00607   gs.copyTo(gradS);
00608   return mc.M3Dxyz2s(R);

00619 WINDLLEXPORT void MCgetBandGradientsxyz(MC_HANDLE mConf,const double *magCoord, double *B, 
00620                                double *gradB, double *gradS, double *gradTh, double *gradPh)
00621 {
00622   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00623   Vector3d mag(magCoord);
00624   Vector3d b, gradb, grads, gradth, gradph;
00625 
00626   mc.getBandGradientsxyz(mag, b, gradb, grads, gradth, gradph);
00627   b.copyTo(B);
00628   gradb.copyTo(gradB);
00629   grads.copyTo(gradS);
00630   gradth.copyTo(gradTh); 
00631   gradph.copyTo(gradPh);
00632 }
00633 
00634 WINDLLEXPORT void  MCgetBandBasisVectorsxyz(MC_HANDLE mConf, const double *u, double *xyz, double *Bxyz, double *gradBxyz, 
00635                            double *e1con, double *e2con, double *e3con,
00636                            double *e1cov, double *e2cov, double *e3cov)
00637 
00638 {
00639   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00640   Vector3d mag(u);
00641   Vector3d b, gradb, xy;
00642   Vector3d e1_con, e2_con, e3_con;
00643   Vector3d e1_cov, e2_cov, e3_cov;
00644 
00645   mc.getBandBasisVectorsxyz(mag, xy, b, gradb,e1_con, e2_con, e3_con, e1_cov, e2_cov, e3_cov);
00646   b.copyTo(Bxyz);
00647   xy.copyTo(xyz);
00648   gradb.copyTo(gradBxyz);
00649   e1_con.copyTo(e1con);
00650   e2_con.copyTo(e2con);
00651   e3_con.copyTo(e3con);
00652   e1_cov.copyTo(e1cov);
00653   e2_cov.copyTo(e2cov);
00654   e3_cov.copyTo(e3cov);
00655 }
00656 
00657 
00658 WINDLLEXPORT double MCgetLocalShear(MC_HANDLE mConf,const double *magCoord)
00659 {
00660   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00661   Vector3d mag(magCoord);
00662   Vector3d B, cyl, grads;
00663   double localshear = mc.getLocalShear(mag,B,cyl,grads);
00664   return localshear;
00665 }
00666 
00667 WINDLLEXPORT int MCsetLCMS(MC_HANDLE mConf, double newLastSurface) //, const char * fname)
00668 {
00669   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00670   int nsmax=0;
00671   double newVolume=0;
00672   bool varNumberMods=true;
00673   bool magAxis=false;
00674   bool circular=false;
00675   bool append=false;
00676  // bool ok = mc.writeasciiReduced(fname,nsmax,newVolume,newLastSurface,varNumberMods,magAxis,circular,append);
00677 
00678   std::string path = getTempDir();
00679   std::string name = "mconfig";
00680   path += name;
00681   std::string pname = createFileName(path);
00682   bool ok = mc.writeasciiReduced(pname.c_str(),nsmax,newVolume,newLastSurface,varNumberMods,magAxis,circular,append);
00683   bool ok2 = mc.load (pname.c_str(), CStconfig::UNDEFINED);
00684 
00685   ::remove(pname.c_str());
00686 
00687   return ok&ok2?1:0;
00688 }
00689 
00690 
00691 //*********************************************************************
00692 // save magnetic coordinate file
00693 // *.bin4; *.bin8 are supported
00694 WINDLLEXPORT int MCwrite(MC_HANDLE mConf, const char * fname)
00695 {
00696   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00697   bool ok= mc.write(fname);
00698   return ok?1:0;
00699 }

00702 //*********************************************************************
00703 WINDLLEXPORT void MCgetCoeffForAstraCode(MC_HANDLE mConf, double sqrts, double *reff, double *gradr2Avr, double *J, double *G2, double *hVprime, double *B0, double *R0, double *h)
00704 {
00705   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00706  double reff_, gradr2Avr_, J_, G2_, hVprime_, B0_, R0_, h_;
00707  mc.getCoeffForAstraCode(sqrts, reff_, gradr2Avr_, J_, G2_, hVprime_, B0_, R0_, h_);
00708   *reff = reff_;
00709   *gradr2Avr = gradr2Avr_;
00710   *J  = J_; 
00711   *G2 = G2_; 
00712   *hVprime = hVprime_; 
00713   *B0 = B0_;
00714   *R0 = R0_; 
00715   *h  = h_;
00716 }

00743 WINDLLEXPORT double MCBoozerBmn(MC_HANDLE mConf,double s,int m,int n)
00744 {
00745   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00746   return mc.BoozerBmn(s,m,n);  
00747 }
00748 
00749 WINDLLEXPORT double MCelongation(MC_HANDLE mConf,double s)
00750 {
00751   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00752   double B00 = mc.BoozerBmn(s,0,0);
00753   double B10 = mc.BoozerBmn(s,1,0);
00754   double et  = mc.r(s)/mc.R0();
00755   B10 /= B00;  
00756   double elongation = pow(et/B10,2.0); 
00757   return elongation;
00758 }
00759 
00760 WINDLLEXPORT double MCJacobian(MC_HANDLE mConf,const double *magCoord)
00761 {
00762   C3dMesh &mc = *((C3dMesh*)mConf);
00763   Vector3d mag(magCoord);
00764   return mc.Jacobian(mag);            
00765 }
